cause.description:
Reba, a sitcom on the CW, was cancled this year after a short 6 season run. There was no good reason for the show to end... there was so much they still needed to happen..... This is a cause for people, who like me...miss the show... and would like to see new eppisodes back on the air!!
1. Reba needs a man...
2. that man should be Brock.
3. We need to see more of the adventures of Van Montgomery.
cause.name: Bring Reba Back
